text: Stefan Petrov (born 19 May 1936) is a Bulgarian wrestler. He competed in the men's Greco-Roman +97 kg at the 1968 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:Bulgarian male sport wrestlers Category:Olympic wrestlers of Bulgaria Category:Wrestlers at the 1968 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Stara Zagora
title: Stefan Petrov
